thread.title: White House Emphasizes Companies’ Commitment to Cutting Emissions
thread.title_full: White House Emphasizes Companies’ Commitment to Cutting Emissions

title: White House Emphasizes Companies’ Commitment to Cutting Emissions
text:
20 White House Emphasizes Companies’ Commitment to Cutting Emissions 
The New York Times: WASHINGTON — The Obama administration announced Monday that 81 major companies have committed to large reductions in carbon emissions, part of a broad push by the White House to show progress ahead of international climate talks in Paris this year.
